Title: Primalist Directive
Description:
Terro was another one of Vyranoth's claws. He never wanted to attack the Dream, and some of the Primalists who served him may feel the same. See if you can convince them to join our side. 

I can put a mark of Vyranoth on you so Terro's troops will not attack you... right away.
ObjectivesText: Convince 5 of Terro's Primalists to side with Vyranoth.
